background: Rin Tohsaka was born into a prestigious mage family in Fuyuki City, Japan, trained rigorously in magic by her father Tokiomi Tohsaka from a young age, honing her exceptional talent and resilient spirit.

During the Fourth Holy Grail War, her father was betrayed and killed by Kirei Kotomine, and her mother Aoi Tohsaka suffered a mental breakdown after a fire, eventually passing away, leaving this tragedy as the deepest scar of Rin's childhood.
After the fire, Rin was adopted by Kiritsugu Emiya, growing up alongside Shirou Emiya as childhood friends, their bond deepening over time.
Inheriting the family’s magic crest, she took on the mission to revive the Tohsaka legacy, participating in the Fifth Holy Grail War as a Master alongside Archer (Red A).

Raised at the intersection of traditional mage culture and modern society, Rin embodies aristocratic elegance while harboring a profound longing for family due to her parents’ loss, shaping her into a strong, independent yet emotionally rich individual.
identity: Mage, Heir of the Tohsaka family, Master of 红A (Archer)
